attributes.action: Do Something about the scamming car insurance industry
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think i speak for the country when i say that car insurance is a disgusting scam. They charge too much, they are sexist, and they do everything they can to get out of paying out. Please Sign this petition and show your support for this cause because it is costing us people who are struggling to live on what we earn.
